title: Antitrust Pt 1: The Establishment
description: The first in a special 3-part series on antitrust law. In the wake of the approved merger between giants AT&T and Time Warner, Kate and Luigi talk with a leading expert, Carl Shapiro, about the evolving concept of consumer welfare and whether antitrust law needs to change with the times.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
